headline: Is MSCI’s New Public–Private Index and Crypto Stance Altering The Investment Case For MSCI (MSCI)?
summary: Earlier this month, MSCI Inc. launched the MSCI All Country Public + Private Equity Index, a daily index blending MSCI ACWI IMI with a modeled private equity component targeting a 15% allocation, while also facing industry pushback over its proposal to exclude companies with substantial crypto treasuries from its benchmarks. The combination of a new public–private equity benchmark built on data from nearly 10,000 private equity funds and a contentious crypto index policy puts MSCI at the...
